generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including a beige building on the left and a multi-story building on the right.
- fence: A fence is visible along the left side of the road, behind the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with a traffic sign on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a blue parking sign and a directional sign indicating "Am Goethehaus" on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road.
- terrain: Grass is visible on the right side of the road, next to the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing bright and clear.
- car: A red van and a silver car are visible on the road, driving towards the camera.
- truck: A truck is visible in the distance, further down the road.
